snippet.title: I COMBINED the 2 BEST Genres In Video Game History | Devlog
snippet.description:
What are the 2 best genres in video game history? Well...let's find out!
Wishlist Mancers of Magic TODAY: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2912670/Mancers_of_Magic/

Let me know in the comments below what your favorite video game genre is...maybe next time I'll combine your ideas!

Discord Server: https://discord.gg/dRDqVEA
Twitter: https://twitter.com/ReeceGeofroy
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/reece_geofroy/

In this video I announce my brand new indie game I am working on...Mancers of Magic!
From developing a third person camera, creating a playable character, and even designing the first game map to play on; there is ton to cover, so let's get into it!

Get a 90% discount on your .fun domain for one year on https://get.fun/reece
Check out my new site at: https://www.boundlessgames.fun/

#devlog #gamedev #indiedev #voxelart #gaming #MancersofMagic #indiegame
